price: Má ṣe gbé ahọ́n rẹ sí ìmísí láti kánjú ké e.
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
